subject: Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
California Chrome (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: For Robert Evans, Tonalist’s win in the Belmont Stakes made up somewhat for a failed Triple Crown by his father’s horse in 1981. But he, like his competition, relayed complaints.
snippet: For Robert Evans, Tonalist’s win in the Belmont Stakes made up somewhat for a failed Triple Crown by his father’s horse in 1981. But he, like his competition, relayed complaints.
